attributes.action: BABY SCANS = PORN = BANNED FROM Facebook
attributes.additional_details: This needs to be put in place, sickening stuff. If i was a baby i wouldn't want my naked body posted to thousands of strangers!

rejection.details:
Complaints about a particular website’s content should first be directed to the site’s manager.  Most Acceptable Use Policies (AUPs) already contain a general clause which allows ISPs to remove sites or content which contain offensive or objectionable material, even if it is not illegal.  Arrangements similar to AUPs apply to many websites, including social networking sites.

Those people, who find user content offensive or suspect, should therefore report their concerns to the appropriate social network site.
